content: > **please note ** this pattern is free to > view in its entirety on my blog this > ad-free downloadable pdf enables me to > be able to bring you more free > patterns in the future go to the free patterns here 2 **description ** what s better than decorating with yarn when your yarny décor is both cute and functional like a basket or two with the handle on life baskets you get a fun set of eye-catching baskets that are worked in one piece from the base to the handles these designs are easy and approachable made in very simple yet squishy stitches and accented with bold stripes they ll look great in a bedroom or living room anywhere you may need to store your current wip of course the sample for this basket was made with hue + me by lion brand yarn 3 affiliate link you can get a kit for this pattern 4 on lion brand s website here you may sell all finished products made from this pattern however you may not share sell or distribute this pattern in any way in whole or in part i would greatly appreciate a link back to my shop or this pattern anytime you sell this item online gauge listed in pattern written in us crochet terms you may not use any of the photos from this listing or the ones contained in the pattern to sell your item you must take your own photos do not create a pattern based on my pattern copyright @ divine debris 2025 no part of this document may be reproduced or transmitted in any form by any means electronic mechanical photocopying or otherwise without prior written permission from the author sales of finished product are permitted but designer requests that you link back to pattern and credit divine debris with the original design under the creative commons attribution-share alike license if you have any questions comments or concerns
